code-table.name: publish-status-code
code-table.hint: The publication status of a document. Determines a workflow for migration to a pubic web site.
code-table.description: Publish status codes are used by workflow processes to determine what files should be reviewed, approved and copied to or removed from the public web site. A document may be in one and only on publishing status at any time.

item.label: Draft
item.definition: An initial draft version of a document. This document may contain many errors. This document is yet ready for others to review.

item.label: Ready for Review
item.definition: A document that is now ready for others to review. Notifications have been sent out to reviewers.

item.label: Under Review
item.definition: A document that is now being read by reviewers. Not yet published.

item.label: On Hold
item.definition: A document that is on hold for some reason. See the document notes for hold reason. Not yet published.

item.label: Approved for Publishing
item.definition: Documents that have been reviewed for publishing but that have not been copied to the public web site.

item.label: Published
item.definition: Documents that are now on the public web site.

item.label: Recalled
item.definition: Documents that are being recalled. There is a process underway to delete this document from the public web site.
